title: (4311) Brand New Luxury House For Sale. Piliyandala Kesbawa
details: Brand New Luxury House For Sale. Piliyandala Kesbawa, 3200 Sqft, Pantry, Living, Dining, T.V Rome, 4 Bed Rooms, Consist of a Room With Balcony, 4 Bathrooms, in for Luxury, full Teak & Rod Iron Furnished, Beautiful Garden, Servants Rooms, Hot Water, 2 Cars Can Be Parked. Near by Main Road. Rs : 188 (negotiable) 18.8 Million
